attributes.action: Do more to reduce energy bills.
attributes.additional_details: Energy bills are increasing at a rate way above inflation. With a rising 8.5million people now living in fuel poverty in the UK, it is important something is done. With energy companies making a profit rise of 733% per customer, it seems energy companies are getting greedier and greedier. The huge profits energy companies are making come at the expense of their customers and the great British public. We need energy and energy companies are taking advantage of that. IT HAS TO STOP!
